txt.en: 'I tell you I've been here since before the Dourhands were thrown out...'
'It proves I was around to hear them talking about the weapon cache they kept hid!'
'That's just some legend to keep us Longbeards in hand!'
'Master Smith, are the tools for the mine ready yet?'
'It's not I tell you! With it we could better defend ourselves from those lowly Dourhands.'
'If you have not noticed, the mines have not been flowing with ore of late!'
'Perhaps, but unless you overheard where it was hidden; it's as good as fools-mithril!'
'What kind of accusation are you making?'
'No accusation, just saying if you want your tools faster; you'll have to get me more ore from the provisioner.'
'Chances of mithril falling from the sky are better.'
'Well if that happens, I'll begin crafting picks of mithril on the moment!'
'At this rate we'll be digging with our fingers by winter!'
